description: Simple one-line log system for tracking workorders with latest entries at top. Format: WO-ID | Project | Description | Timestamp. Global log file with auto-logging on workorder completion and slash command invocation.
goal: Track workorders, enable traceability, improve coordination, simplify reporting, and allow devs to see project updates with a quick glance
requirements: log_workorder MCP tool to append new workorder entries
get_workorder_log MCP tool to read/query log with filters
Latest entries at top (prepend - reverse chronological order)
One-line format: WO-ID | Project | Description | Timestamp
Global centralized log across all projects
Auto-log on workorder completion before git push
out_of_scope: Log rotation - automatic log file size management
Search/filtering - advanced query capabilities (just basic reading for MVP)
Export formats - CSV, JSON export (just raw text for MVP)
constraints: Must be simple - minimal complexity, just append to text file
